title: Temporary Freeze in-game
body: While I'd be playing in-game, every so often my screen would unfortunately freeze for about 3 seconds. It's not the worst thing but I have definitely lost a few exchanges because of it. My Laptop is fairly new, this only started AFTER I updated Windows 10. If someone could please shed some light on this issue and give a solution, I would be grateful.

replies.body:
If you've recently updated Windows 10, a good first step would be to make sure that the Game DVR is still turned off. Most Windows 10 updates have been known to re-enable it. 

After checking for that, let's make sure to go ahead and do a quick check for packet loss as well. Hit up our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and let it scan your recent network logs of a game that was freezing like this. Grab a screenshot if you can using something like Gyazo, that way I can look over it with you!
